text: [MUSIC PLAYING]
JOE ANDERSEN: This is our Next Gen Unreal Engine HMI experience.
So we have the pillar-to-pillar display on top,
which is 8K and then the 1080 display on the bottom.
The instrument cluster with ADAS, surround view.
We have the ability to launch apps and games.
And we have a fully animated character
who will walk you through the entire experience.
SPEAKER: Hey, there.
Welcome aboard.
I'm your digital copilot, powered entirely by Unreal Engine 5.
JOE ANDERSEN: And it really takes that avatar in your car
to the next level.
SPEAKER: Tap the themes button to experience one of Unreal Engine's
biggest strengths--
unique, interactive experiences built right into the HMI.
JOE ANDERSEN: We had a little fun with the themes here at CES.
So we have this Fall Guys theme that spans across the whole experience.
And you can play with the beans.
And there's actually a little hidden button that
causes them to break out into dance.
SPEAKER: Congratulations on your first achievement.
JOE ANDERSEN: As you go throughout the experience,
we give you achievements.
The first one is when you go through the themes,
you get an achievement for that.
And then with the auto drive, you get to experience
some of the apps and games.
You get an achievement for doing that.
And then at the very end, when you have arrived at your destination,
you get an achievement for that, which completes the experience.
SPEAKER: You did it.
100% complete.
And you've unlocked your reward.
Tap it a few times to reveal your surprise.
JOE ANDERSEN: When you get to the end of experience,
you unlock a special gift.
SPEAKER: A brand new car skin.
JOE ANDERSEN: So it's a lot of fun.
And I think people at CES really enjoy having a little bit of fun
at the conference.
